attributes.action: reappoint Sir Nicholas Serota as Director of the Tate Gallery
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to state that he will give his approval to any reappointment of Sir Nicholas Serota as Director of the Tate gallery.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
